name: BostonCollegeEaglesGameTracker
0:
”"Alexa, ask Eagles Game Tracker what is today's football game."”
”"Alexa, ask Eagles Game Tracker when is the next volleyball game."”
”"Alexa, open Eagles Game Tracker and give me a list of the games on September 1, 2017"”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: eagles game tracker
des:
Created for the Boston College community, the Boston College Eagles Game Tracker skill allows you to stay up to date on when your favorite Eagles team is playing. The skill can provide information on any one of Boston College’s varsity sport teams so that you can coordinate when and where to show your support!

Once enabling the skill on your Alexa-enabled device, activate the skill by saying “Alexa, ask Eagles Game Tracker …” or “Alexa, open Eagles Game Tracker and …” combined with a phrase. You can ask about a specific sport or about all of the sports in general. Here are some phrases to try out:

-“what is today’s football game.”
-“when is the field hockey game on October 1, 2017”
-“when the next volleyball game is.”
-“give me a list of today's games.”
-“who is playing today.”

The skill is also compatible with the Amazon Alexa mobile app, so you can get written information about your request on your mobile device.

Enable the skill today and show that you are truly Boston College’s biggest Super Fan!


(Information courtesy of Boston College Athletics)
